attributes.action: Take appropriate note of the e-petition service he has set up and acknowledge this in his forward democratic processes - i.e people first
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government must acknowledge the people input to his new process.  At the moment it looks like their is no chance and he has made a big mistake - like Iraq.  Blair's legacy is doomed.  Let us ask what he does (I mean does) as a result of the No. 10 email stuff.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
